import NavBar from'./NavBar.js';import News from'./NewsContent.js';import{BrowserRouter,Routes,Route}from"react-router-dom";import About from'./About.js';import Contact from'./Contact.js';import Cart from'./Cart.js';import Search1 from'./Search1.js';import DescriptionOfItems from'./DescriptionOfItems.js';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[modestyle,newmodestyle]=useState("dark");const[btnValue,setBtnValue]=useState("Dark Mode");const[cart,setCart]=useState([]);const[text,setText]=useState('');const toggleMode=()=>{if(modestyle==="dark"){newmodestyle('light');setBtnValue("Light Mode");}else{newmodestyle('dark');setBtnValue("Dark Mode");}};console.log(cart);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"firstParent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(BrowserRouter,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavBar,{title:"elecTRONic",Home:"Home",mode:modestyle,toggle:toggleMode,value:btnValue,text:text,setText:setText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/about",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(About,{mode:modestyle})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Content,{mode:modestyle,cart:cart,setCart:setCart,text:text})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/contact",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Contact,{mode:modestyle})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/news",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(News,{mode:modestyle})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/cart",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cart,{mode:modestyle,cart:cart,setCart:setCart})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/Search",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Search1,{mode:modestyle,cart:cart,setCart:setCart})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/items/:id",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DescriptionOfItems,{cart:cart,setCart:setCart,mode:modestyle})})]})]})})});}export default App;
